title: Pyth Feed Map
description: Mapping of asset symbols to Pyth Network feed IDs for Base network. Feed IDs are obtained from https://pyth.network/developers/price-feed-ids

WETH.description: ETH/USD (WETH uses same feed as ETH)

WBTC.description: BTC/USD (WBTC uses same feed as BTC)

cbBTC.description: BTC/USD (cbBTC uses same feed as BTC)

USDbC.description: USDC/USD (USDbC uses same feed as USDC)

notes: Feed IDs are 32-byte hex strings (66 characters including 0x prefix)
weETH feed ID is a placeholder and should be updated with the actual feed ID
For ratio feeds (e.g., cbETH/ETH, weETH/ETH), you may need to compose with ETH/USD
Update this file with additional assets as needed for your deployment
